setTargetColor(Color) - Method in class AnimatedBalls

Shapes - Class in geometricPrimitives
Base class for moving object used by BasicGUI
show() - Method in class geometricPrimitives.Shapes
Show the object
simpleLogic() - Static method in class AnimationLauncher
A very simple logic to be executed every time the shapes are painted.
It does the following:
- add shapes to the screen
- remove shapes that go out of the screen
- change color of shapes
- change speed of shapes due to gravity
- detect collision of shapes and implement rebound effect
Square - Class in geometricPrimitives
A class implementing the behavior of a square
